website_summaries.verdict: A handy dandy little device that  works well and comes with a saver to keep your avocado fresh.
pros: The handle on this makes it a little easier to use than others
Metal edge to grab and twist the pit for removal
Comes with an avocado saver to keep the "other half" from getting brown before you can eat it
Good sharp edge for splitting the avocado in half
cons: This avocado slicer does not come with instructions

customer_reviews.title: Better than the other avocado cutters
customer_reviews.text: So I love this one of the other best selling avocado cutter because this one has a handle so you never touch avocado leftovers. It takes a little getting used to but I think it functions perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have, not needed
customer_reviews.text: Love using this, but it’s pointless if the avocado you’re cutting is even a little bit mushy
customer_reviews.author: Courtney B

customer_reviews.title: Happy tool for avocados lovers!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product. Firstly , I love avocados. In the past I have been using a a chef knife to split the avocados in half and chop the seed to take out- very dangerous. There’s a phrase in hospital called avocado hands for ppl like me who accidentally hurt themselves opening avocados this way. This tool simplify the chore of opening, taking the seed out and splitting he meat into nice slices. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Radrayster

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I use my new avocado slicer, splitter and cutter almost daily as I eat avocados daily. It is very practical and I no longer need to use a knife to slice it, split it and cut it. Great invention. Noelle
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I like that its safer. I like the holder for the left over part. The slicer doesnt really slice softer avocados. It kinda mashes the avocado but that's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Net

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't imagine I needed a kitchen utensil just for avocados---however this thing works great! Has saved me from cutting myself in the palm which I often do when removing an avocado pit. I've already purchased two more as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: alsomama

customer_reviews.title: Needs more times, slices too thick.
customer_reviews.text: The slices are too thick, meaning I need thinner slices in my uses. It’s fully functional, I just didn’t really notice that it needs maybe 2-3 more times in order to make thin enough slices, so it wasn’t a good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alzabo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest time I’ve ever had cutting and taking a pit out of an avocado! Best seemingly unnecessary kitchen tool I have ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This avocado tool is for LARGE  avocados.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool, but you end up having to use your fingers to extract the avocado "flesh" through the plastic blades. It would really only work well on larger avocados. I recommend saving your money by not buying this "gadget." Instead just use a large plastic spoon or a metal one.
customer_reviews.author: TKB, WA State

customer_reviews.title: but the joke was on me because this thing works AMAZING! You will not regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a bit of a gag gift, but the joke was on me because this thing works AMAZING! You will not regret buying this. The scoop-out-and-slice feature is a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase another.
customer_reviews.text: The best part about this is the ease in which you take out the seed. The slicing is not so good, the peeler part is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use/clean.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic item. If you love avocados you need to purchase this tool. So easy to use and clean. I use mine daily and takes seconds to clean. I purchased two and gave one to my father. Will need to get another one for my daughter when she leaves first college.
customer_reviews.author: Brittni Roc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Happy to find something that is well designed and works as described. Avocados need to be at the prime ripeness, too old will smush, as should be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Collector

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! First of all, it looks adorable. Secondly, it works great! The only thing is it’s a little hard to clean. If you use it everyday like me, it’s a little bit of a pain trying to clean it, but it works well with a dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not good with small to medium avacados
customer_reviews.text: I bought this instead of the good grips version I had before and I do not like it as well. It doesn’t work with all size avacados.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaswan

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says. Makes cutting an avocado quick and easy. As far as cleaning I'd rinse while still freshly used if washing by hand, I didn't have any trouble cleaning but like all things with small spaces it pays to rinse and not let food dry in the small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and easy
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed so we do t have to take our hands into our hands. Awesome and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny McKaig

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot bigger than expected and I found it hard to use on smaller avocados. Ended up giving it away.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Lowden

customer_reviews.title: My mom uses it every day.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, my mom loves it. Was a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley C

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter but I basically use it all the time. It easily removes the pit, and with one simple sweep, you have perfect slices for toast. I also use it for making guacamole and it just mushes up so much easier when it starts off in slices. I love this gadget!!
customer_reviews.author: David Peters

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite kitchen tools
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool. Works great and is made well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mmv

customer_reviews.title: n****a
customer_reviews.text: no more cuts, this is a fantastic gadget. wish I knew about it sooner
customer_reviews.author: denise d,

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very helpful and useful item for someone who eats lots of a avocados
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves Avocados
customer_reviews.text: Good kitchen gadget. Daughter uses a lot to make guacamole.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Moore

customer_reviews.title: Dotala Avocado Tool
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Doesn't fit avocado properly. Makes it very awkward to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bean

customer_reviews.title: Good For more than just Avocados
customer_reviews.text: Love this little tool. Easy to use and fairly easy to clean. I have also used this tool for more than avocados such as apples and bananas for salads.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I love this tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It make enjoying avacados very easy. Shipped in good time.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Should Have One!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest invention since sliced bread!! It takes only seconds to pit, slice, and peel an avocado, and is so simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Kalaf

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated! Everyone who loves avocado`s should have one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Pam J. Fegley

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work:(
customer_reviews.text: I threw this in the trash. Apparently you must have a perfectly-sized avocado for this tool to work. I’ll continue using a knife to remove the pit & slice it.
customer_reviews.author: napoleon

customer_reviews.title: Neat tool
customer_reviews.text: Neat tool. I don't use it. Gave it to my avocado-loving wife for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Howie

customer_reviews.title: I use this tool weekly
customer_reviews.text: This tool is soooo handy idk how I got along without it
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dean

customer_reviews.title: This is the best invention! Much easier than other avocado slicer!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best thing that I have purchased in a long time! I love avocados and this makes it so easy to enjoy them !! very easy to clean and dishwasher safe!! It is high quality and very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I use Avo almost everyday and I needed something to make it convenient to get out. This is awesome and I am so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses it regularly and likes the results. It has made preparing avocado a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: By far the best
customer_reviews.text: I love this avocado tool, it makes things like cutting, spliting easier, and it's easy to clean,too!!! Overall it's byfar the best avocado tool that Ive uesd. If you need one, don't hesitate!!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Li

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a marvelous kitchen aid! A 'must have" for all avocado lovers!
customer_reviews.author: gmg

customer_reviews.title: TikTok made me buy this
customer_reviews.text: TikTok made me buy this and it was worth every cent! Thank goodness it’s avocado season. This product is easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. Worst purchase. The slicer does NOT slice. And I can get the avocado pit out easier with a knife. Disappointed 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more hurt with knife
customer_reviews.text: No more hurt with knife,if you love avocado you need this,such a handy gadget and works great,Good comfort handle,no mess and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Abbieobi

customer_reviews.title: Good if you’re into gimmicky items
customer_reviews.text: It’s much easier to just use a knife and a spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Max Mraz

customer_reviews.title: So much easier to make guacamole now. Perfect tool!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Not sure how we got by without it. Easy to use, the knife part is great. Keeps your hands clean.
customer_reviews.author: @Ladylike1021

customer_reviews.title: Will Break!
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t last long! One of the slicer pieces broke off. Big disappointment. Past the return window.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Stop getting avocado hand like me and my GF and get this product today!!
customer_reviews.author: K.Stallone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Makes it very quick & easy to split, de-pit, and slice avocados. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s only for a big avocados, not medium or small...couldn’t catch the hard core seed of medium one...
customer_reviews.author: Anis

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Especially the middle part that takes out the pit. Couldn’t be better.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I saw this used a restaurant on a cruise and came back and bought one. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase. IT has changed my life!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz R.

customer_reviews.title: Very innovative
customer_reviews.text: Great tool! Works really well - very innovative. Doesn't mash up the avocado, but produces nice clean slices.
customer_reviews.author: MJY

customer_reviews.title: The teeth are sharp!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the bomb. It literally worked perfectly on the 2 avocados a day diet I love lol
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M Stephens

customer_reviews.title: LOVE. LOVE. LOVEEEEE
customer_reviews.text: Easiest kitchen gadget to use. Eliminates the struggle and mess of avacados.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Not as easy on an overly ripe avocado, but worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Bailee Graham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great item. easy to use, won't get your hands dirty, loving it
customer_reviews.author: Shoujun W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! Seems so silly, but it is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. My sister loved it. Best gift I could have gotten an avocado lover. Keeps fresh perfect to the next day and the tool is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift; love how easy it makes cutting an avocado!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffane Gealey

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really get the pit out like you think it would unless I am using it wrong
customer_reviews.author: Healthy1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite utensil that I own, I actually have 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: The pit remover hole is too small. It was not big enough to remove the pit. The “prongs” are not strong enough to slice well. Better off using something else.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: All avocado lovers should own one of these!
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time and wish I had found it earlier! It is very easy to use and has a decent grip. Avocado can get stuck so it helps to run it under some water right after using.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it, I'll stick with a knife and spoon
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it but I think it's just "okay". I'll stick with a knife to dice and de-pit, then a spoon to scoop. I've tried with this but I needed a knife to "pre-cut" in a direction perpendicular to the blades, then used this to cut and remove in the opposite direction. It worked, but I ended up with a bunck of stuck together dices that were partly mashed. I'd rather stick with my cross cuts with a knife then remove each dice separately with a spoon. Yes, the OCD is strong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: TSmithLXIX

customer_reviews.title: Does as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I selected this tool because the avocado skin slicer was separate from the handle. I did not want to have to get my hand messy by slicing the avocado with the handle. It does works well for slicing an avocado. I don't really care for the pit puller. It seems like I have to smack the pit really hard for it to actually attach and pull the pit out. In retrospect did I really need this tool. Probably not. A knife and spoon worked just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Flora Jean

customer_reviews.title: Avoid Avocado Hand-Cutting Injuries!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is awesome when cutting avocados. The "thumb" that sticks out is sharp enough to cut through the skin of an avocado all the way to the pit but not so sharp that you have to worry too much about cutting yourself. The metal pit remover works wonders and pops the pit right out. If you want avocado slices, the rounded part slices easily and evenly. Very easy to rinse and clean as well. I use this all the time!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of avacado's and would bring them to work. Normally I would use a knife and fork to open and eat them, but someone showed me this handy tool and said I should invest. I eat small avacado's and I just couldn't figure out this at all. I gave it away to a friend, I'll stick to what works
customer_reviews.author: Fraternalhero

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad this isn't the only Christmas gift I got for my wife!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad this isn't the only Christmas gift I got for my wife! She loves avocados, so I thought it was perfect. She tried very hard, but said it wouldn't do anything it was supposed to. Trying to make slices made mush. It is probably too late to return it, so I will probably price it for a dollar on our next garage sale.
customer_reviews.author: Don u

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after a trip to the emergency room for stitches. Works just as advertised and washes like a dream. No more "avocado accidents" for this family!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Useful for medium to large avocados only.
customer_reviews.text: It is useful for only certain size of avocados (medium to large). For small sized or some medium sized avocados, the the seed separatar in the middle doesn’t work. The product could get 5 stars if the seed separator could be made flexible to contract or expand based on the size of the avocado.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken at third use
customer_reviews.text: Broken at the third use. I don’t think I applied too much force but broken into pieces and cut my left hand pretty deep. Functional until broken though.
customer_reviews.author: Oguz Aytekin

customer_reviews.title: Almost, but not quite
customer_reviews.text: So it does everything well except remove the pit... which is why I bought it since my girlfriend kept stabbing her self in the hand trying to remove them before. Unless you’re using monster avacados, the pit is jus too small to be grasped by this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a stocking stuffer for my husband. He didn't think much of it until he used it..... This works assume, everything about this works great. When it arrives it looks like it wouldn't work. It cuts through the avocado no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Too big of a scoop
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little smaller. It's really difficult to scoop out small avocados.
customer_reviews.author: marsh

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: I'm not liking this too much since I can't use it with larger sized avocados as a splitter. The pitting function is also useless. Was not worth it :(
customer_reviews.author: Monee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't exactly work on all avocados
customer_reviews.text: I would like to rate this higher, but the pitting device doesn't work on all avocados. Also, when scraping out the avocado fruit, it kind of mushes up the fruit. One thing that it does do well is cut the skin. I'm thinking this is a "meh" tool.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this utensil a fair rating when I first got it. But I’ve been using it and I was wrong, it’s actually really pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Plastic could be stonger
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a few times and it's a bit of a struggle to pull it thru an avocado that is not soft. the tines bend and sometimes skip the cut portion of the function. I may upgrade to something stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product if you eat avocados as much as ...
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product if you eat avocados as much as I do and different things that I make with them this is wonderful it's beautifully slicing each Life is Beautiful to the eyes I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Rene Waddy

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all. The avocado saver is great. Even if you don’t have a clean cut it still does a good job at not oxidizing the avocado. The slicer is magic. Pure sorcery. Thank god im not using plastic bags anymore to keep my avos
customer_reviews.author: lilpoopstain

customer_reviews.title: life changing
customer_reviews.text: I love this avocado slicer tool so much. it works perfectly and is easy to clean

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and high quality materials. Does not feel cheap. Hard to clean if not done right after use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great tool! Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great tool! Works well and is made of high quality material. Wish I had purchased an extra one for my motorhome. I can't live without it now.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was hard to take out pit and didn’t slice avocado well. Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Could not for the life of me work this contraption!

This say in my cart for 6+ months before I bought it. ;) It only I had a time machine....

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a bit on the thin side.
customer_reviews.text: Well I did use it twice before it cracked. Not sure if their was a weak point or something. Pretty disappointed..

customer_reviews.title: Must need in your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: If you use avocados frequently or in the kitchen at all this is a must have ! I used to have problems making avocado mash for my breakfast because separating the pit was so hard. This makes breakfast so much easier for me. Def a staple for a well equip kitchen

customer_reviews.text: I’m lazy. This tool has cut like a minute out slicing avacados. It’s quite handy.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and my wife likes the way it fits in her hand
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo F

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean all in one tool
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best avocado slicer I’ve used. All the other ones have moving parts that get messy and are tough to clean, this one is sharp enough to slice the avocado but not your hand, and is so easy to clean. Buy it, you won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool! It works perfectly as long as the avocado is ripe. It makes eating avocados so easy! Plus, it's super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to have on hand for those avocados we love to eat. It makes getting into it very convenient and with ease.
customer_reviews.author: BSR

product_meta.title: Dotala 3 in 1 Avocado Slicer Tool Works as a Splitter, Pitter and Cutter as knife peeler scoop with Comfort-Grip Handle (Green-Slicer)
feature_bullets: 1.Three-in-One tool splits, pits, and slices avocados safely and effectively.
2.Slicer Removes Fruit from Skin in Perfectly even slices.
3.The Pitter Designed Enough for the medium-Larger Avocado core with a safe and easy twisting motion,For small Core you can easily use the Split
4.With an ergonomic, comfort-grip handle will keep you in control of your slicing,which will not made your hands mess.
5.New updated and Durable Design,BPA free,FDA silicone material,and easy to clean-dishwasher safe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars363 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
